mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spot (spot_no, name, type, description, district_no) VALUES (#{spot_no}, #{name}, #{type}, #{description}, #{district_no})
mapper.select: SELECT spot_no, name, type, description, district_no FROM spot ORDER BY spot_no ASC
SELECT spot_no, name, type, description, district_no FROM spot WHERE district_no = #{district_no} ORDER BY name ASC
